forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 65. West northwest wind 8 to 21 mph, with gusts as high as 28 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 53. West northwest wind 7 to 18 mph, with gusts as high as 28 mph.

weather_report:
As dawn breaks over Downtown San Francisco, the day unfolds with a tapestry of blue skies and the soft brilliance of sunlight, inviting locals to step outside and embrace what promises to be a pleasant day. The cool west-northwest winds, brushing lightly through the streets, carry with them that signature San Francisco essence—refreshing yet gentle—allowing for an invigorating stroll along the waterfront or through the vibrant neighborhoods.

The marine layer appears to have retreated, granting a clear view toward the Golden Gate Bridge and beyond, perhaps trying to whisper secrets only the most observant can discern. With no fog clinging to the hills, the visibility is high, beckoning adventurers to take to the city's countless trails or relax in a nearby café, savoring the last tastes of coffee before the day fully wakes. Yet, as the sun rises higher, the chill of the morning will gradually give way to a comfortable 65 degrees, perfect for a light jacket over a simple t-shirt for those who wish to wander through the city sights in comfort. The evening will shift softly toward a quieter cadence, with temperatures settling nicely as one prepares to enjoy dinner under the stars or perhaps a relaxed gathering of friends as the azure sky transitions to a canvas of dusk. This day in San Francisco, serenely spectacular, offers a lovely backdrop to life's simple pleasures—perfect for conversations, explorations, or simply savoring a moment in this vibrant city.
